Bose Frames Tenor & Soprano | The latest Bose sunglasses are here

[Preview pane]

The latest Bose sunglasses blend enhanced features, stylings and designs for a heightened way to listen.

See this email online
 
 
 

Without sound, they’re just sunglasses.

 

Thoughtfully refined and strikingly elegant, the latest Bose sunglasses are here. Two new luxe silhouettes flaunt polarised lenses and premium craftsmanship while exclusive Bose Open Ear Audio™ technology produces sound you’d never expect from sunglasses. It’s a jaw-dropping experience that leaves you free to engage with the world around you while discreetly listening to music.

 
 
Shop Tenor style
 
 
Shop Soprano style
 
 
Swap lenses. But make it fashion.
 

You have more than one look. So do our lenses. Shop the Bose Frames Lens Collection for interchangeable coloured lenses you can easily swap between on the fly to complete your look. Polarised lenses available.
